title: Siege Engine (5U60)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an Uruk-hai to place an [Isengard] token on a machine. Response: If one or more machines are about to be discarded by an opponent, discard this condition to prevent that.
Lore:	“Ropes… were hurled over the parapet….”
Rarity:	U
